channel.title: Blog on Maguire Krist
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Maguire Krist

item.title: Filling the Gap: Building a High-Performance, Mutable AcroForm PDF Processor in .NET
item.description: I built a C#/.NET PDF processor with performance in the same band as PDFPig—and added what I couldn’t find for free in .NET: true in-memory, mutable AcroForms you can edit and save. It powers my upcoming forms-over-data SaaS, SubmitPath (coming soon at submitpath.com).
